item.name: Tamborine Estate Wines
item.description: Tamborine Estate is a joint venture between the well-known John Cassegrain (of Cassegrain Wines at Port Macquarie) and French-born entrepreneur Bernard Forey (owner of the large Richfield Vineyard at Tenterfield in northern NSW). They have acquired the former Mount Tamborine Winery and its 2.5 ha of merlot, cabernet franc and malbec, planted adjacent to the winery. Exports to Switzerland, Singapore and Thailand.
